name: Hotel Monte Cenci
description: A 10-minute walk from both the Pantheon and Piazza Navona in the centre of Rome, Hotel Monte Cenci boasts a rooftop terrace, bar and stylish rooms with air conditioning and parquet floors. WiFi is free throughout. The spacious rooms come with an elegant décor, a satellite flat-screen TV and a minibar. The en suite bathroom includes a hairdryer and free toiletries. An extensive sweet and savoury buffet breakfast is prepared daily, served on the terrace in fine weather, and gluten-free options are also available. It includes eggs, omelettes, pastries, cheese and cold cuts. Campo de' Fiori is 500 metres from Hotel Monte Cenci, while the lively area of Trastevere is a 5-minute walk away.

name: Hotel The Brand
description: The Brand is a modern building set in a green, peaceful suburb of Rome, close to the A90 motorway access. The hotel offers free parking but the garage is subject to charges 10 euro per day. A public bus, running every 30 minutes, takes you to the Baldo Degli Ubaldi Metro Station (line A). The Brand has a reading room, TV lounge, and large, private gardens. Rooms at The Brand are bright and come with air conditioning.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Rome Monti
description: Find yourself in a centrally located hotel in Rome when you make DoubleTree by Hilton Rome Monti your place to stay during your visit. The flair of Rome and all of its cultural, historical and town hotspots are conveniently near our hotel. For families, our hotel has kid-friendly amenities that will make the trip easier. Our separate convention center entrance and 3 meeting rooms also make us a great host to medium-sized events and ceremonies in Rome. When you arrive at our hotel, admire the view of the skylight and peristylium inspired design. We will greet you with our warm DoubleTree Chocolate Chip Cookie upon check-in. Unwind in one of our guest rooms featuring complimentary WiFi, minibar, coffee and tea-making facilities as well as other amenities to enhance your stay. Upgrade your room for more space, an espresso machine and more bathroom amenities, or upgrade to a suite for a separate living area. Fine dining and a great atmosphere are not far away with our main restaurant on the ground floor. It offers international cuisine for breakfast and dinner and also features a show cooking window. DoubleTree by Hilton Rome Monti is the place to be when you come to visit Rome.Hilton

name: Mama Shelter Roma
description: Mama Shelter Roma is your home away from home in the heart of Rome. Our neighbourhood hotel is nested a few steps away from the Vatican treasures. Whether you are here for work or play, local or just passing through the capital, Mama Roma will look afteryou. With cutting edge design elements, Mama Shelter Roma houses 217 bedrooms. With several private atelier style meeting rooms, bars and restaurants, a rooftop with a solarium, outdoor Garden Bar and a pool, Mama Roma will both spoil and inspire you.accorhotels.com

name: Crowne Plaza Rome - St. Peter's
description: Crowne Plaza Rome - St. Peter's is on the historic Via Aurelia Antica, 5 km from the Vatican and very close to the lush Villa Pamphili Park. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. This Crowne Plaza is surrounded by its private park. Massages and beauty treatments can be booked on site. The spa is free for all guests as well as the 2 tennis courts and the outdoor swimming pool, open during the summer and featuring a pool bar. There is also a free fitness centre open 24 hours a day. Rooms are spacious and come with modern furnishings. The buffet breakfast is American-style. The restaurant is open all day long and serves delicious, Italian cuisine. During summer meals are served on the terrace. There is also a business centre. Crowne Plaza Rome - St. Peter's offers free parking. A scheduled transfer service to/from Rome Fiumicino Airport is arranged on request, at extra costs. Buses stop outside the hotel and there is a taxi station on site.

name: Hotel Indigo Rome - St. George
description: Welcome to Hotel Indigo Rome - St. George. The hotel boasts a privileged position for discovering the wonders of the Eternal City. 5-star luxury boutique hotel located in the enchanting Via Giulia, in the heart of the historic center of Rome, a few steps from Piazza Navona, Campo de' Fiori, Castel Sant'Angelo and the Vatican Museums. 5-star luxury hotel Rome historic centre: Local inspiration. The boutique Hotel Indigo® Rome - St. George is characterized by an atmosphere full of charm and history. The ancient Renaissance walls surround the contemporary design environments and the modern interiors blend perfectly with important historical testimonies. The large travertine stones on the facade, which come from the Colosseum, recall the shape of modern sofas. The building's Renaissance style and travertine marble walls decorate the lobby, restaurant and bar, all examples of great eras. During the summer season, I Sofà Bar Restaurant & Roof Terrace moves to the panoramic terrace of the hotel, offering a breathtaking view over the roofs and monuments of Rome. Our chef chooses 0 km products and offers tasty "Roman" recipes, preferring products of the season. Treat yourself to some relaxation in the St. George Spa, the hotel's wellness centre, consisting of a sauna, Turkish bath, large whirlpool tub and mini-gym. From this boutique hotel you can discover the delightful shops of Rione Regola.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Hotel Castellino Roma
description: Set just next to Piazza Venezia, in the very centre of Rome, great value Hotel Castellino Roma offers the perfect location for exploring all the city’s sights. The hotel features free WiFi throughout and modern-style rooms. Each room at the Piazza Venezia hotel is decorated with works of modern art, and includes a satellite flat-screen TV, air conditioning and a private bathroom with hairdryer, slippers and toiletries. Some rooms have views of Piazza Venezia square, while suites have a spa bath. An American buffet-style breakfast is provided daily in the dedicated breakfast room. With the Roman Forum on one side, just a 5-minute walk away and the Trevi Fountain on the other, you couldn’t be better placed. Fashion and shopping streets are just a few steps away and of course, right opposite the hotel you have the huge Vittorio Emanuele II monument.
